objects.text:
• Color-changing LED light-up soles
• Rechargeable USB battery
• Multiple lighting modes & patterns
Light Up Your Path in Style

product_details.name: Luminous Stride LED Sneakers - Light Up Your Path in Style
product_details.description:
• Color-changing LED light-up soles with vibrant purple glow
• Rechargeable battery with USB charging capability
• Durable white synthetic leather upper for lasting comfort
• Lightweight construction for all-day wear
• Water-resistant design for worry-free use
• Multiple lighting modes and patterns
• Up to 8-12 hours of continuous illumination
• Perfect for parties, concerts, and night activities
• Non-marking rubber outsole
• Available in unisex sizes
• Easy on/off switch control
• Modern minimalist design suitable for casual wear

banner_details:
The banner is a high-impact promotional design for a futuristic product, LED sneakers. It is divided vertically with a glowing gradient background that transitions from deep violet on the left to bright purple on the right, creating a energetic ambiance. The large text element with id `heading` introduces the product name with bold, white typography. Just below it, the id `subheading` adds a stylish subtitle in bright purple tech-style font. The id `description` is a bullet-point list describing product features in white, clean sans-serif font. Pricing is emphasized with the id `price` in purple futuristic font. A rounded rectangle button with the id `cta_button` and white-labeled CTA text (`cta`) draws attention near the center-left. The tagline positioned at the bottom-left using the `tagline` layer adds a stylish finishing touch. The product image (`product_image`) displays illuminated sneakers slightly to the right, enhanced by a radial glow from the background SVG (`background`). The design features subtle circular decorative elements and neon lines for a digital, modern finish.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Violet: #1A0030
- Electric Purple: #9B4DFF
- Rich Plum: #380066
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of LED-lit sneakers glowing with a vibrant purple hue, ideal for a futuristic and youthful advertisement banner. The primary colors include Electric Purple (#B300FF), White Glow (#FFFFFF), and Deep Indigo (#1C0038). The purple LED lighting is smoothly blended along the sole and gradates into surrounding areas, creating a luminous effect without overwhelming the darker shadows. The white LED circles on the sole stand out sharply, adding emphasis and detail. The background darkness contrasts effectively, helping the light to pop and guide visual focus to the sneakers. Ideal banner palette: #B300FF, #FFFFFF, #1C0038, #5900A0.
